  • Reference

Add Shiny static resources to Shiny Server

Source: R/external_resources.R
addExternalResources.Rd

Make scripts available to their components.

Usage

addExternalResources()

Value

adds external resources to the Shiny app by returning a tags$head element that includes:

  • Resource Paths

  • JavaScript and CSS scripts

  • Favicon

  • Font Links

  • Custom JS Handles
